org.sat4j.tools
クラス Backbone

java.lang.Object
  org.sat4j.tools.Backbone

public class Backbone
extends java.lang.Object

The aim of this class is to compute efficiently the literals implied by the set of constraints (also called backbone or unit implicates). The work has been done in the context of ANR BR4CP.

作成者:
leberre

メソッドの概要
static IVecInt compute(ISolver solver)
          Computes the backbone of a formula following the algorithm described in Joﾃ｣o Marques-Silva, Mikolﾃ｡s Janota, Inﾃｪs Lynce: On Computing Backbones of Propositional Theories.
static IVecInt compute(ISolver solver, int[] implicant)
           
static IVecInt compute(ISolver solver, int[] implicant, IVecInt assumptions)
           
static IVecInt compute(ISolver solver, IVecInt assumptions)
          Computes the backbone of a formula following the algorithm described in Joﾃ｣o Marques-Silva, Mikolﾃ｡s Janota, Inﾃｪs Lynce: On Computing Backbones of Propositional Theories.
